Package kankan.wheel.widget

Interface Summary
OnWheelChangedListener Wheel changed listener interface.
OnWheelClickedListener Wheel clicked listener interface.
OnWheelScrollListener Wheel scrolled listener interface.
WheelAdapter Deprecated. Use WheelViewAdapter
WheelScroller.ScrollingListener Scrolling listener interface
WheelViewAdapter Wheel items adapter interface
 

Class Summary
AbstractWheelAdapter Abstract Wheel adapter.
AbstractWheelTextAdapter Abstract wheel adapter provides common functionality for adapters.
AdapterWheel Deprecated. Will be removed soon
ArrayWheelAdapter<T> The simple Array wheel adapter
ItemsRange Range for visible items.
NumericWheelAdapter Numeric Wheel adapter.
WheelRecycle Recycle stores wheel items to reuse.
WheelScroller Scroller class handles scrolling events and updates the
WheelView Numeric wheel view.
